property.value: aes256-cts-hmac-sha1-96 aes128-cts-hmac-sha1-96 des3-cbc-sha1 arcfour-hmac-md5 camellia256-cts-cmac camellia128-cts-cmac des-cbc-crc des-cbc-md5 des-cbc-md4

property.name: libdefaults_default_tkt_enctypes
property.description: a space-delimited list of session key encryption types supported by the KDC or Active Directory
property.value: aes256-cts-hmac-sha1-96 aes128-cts-hmac-sha1-96 des3-cbc-sha1 arcfour-hmac-md5 camellia256-cts-cmac camellia128-cts-cmac des-cbc-crc des-cbc-md5 des-cbc-md4

property.name: realm
property.description: The realm to use when creating service principals

property.name: domains
property.description: A comma-delimited list of domain names that the realm serves (optional)

property.name: kdc_type
property.description: The type of KDC being used. Either mit-kdc or active-directory

property.name: kdc_host
property.description: The IP address or FQDN of the KDC or Active Directory server, optionally a port number may be provided

property.name: admin_server_host
property.description: The IP address or FQDN of the administrative Kerberos server, optionally a port number may be provided

property.name: test_principal
property.description: The principal that may be used to test the Kerberos configuration (this will not be retained)

property.name: test_password
property.description: The password for the administrative principal (either this value or the keytab value is required to be set, neither is expected to be retained)

property.name: test_keytab
property.description: The base64-encoded keytab for the test principal (either this value or the password value is required to be set, neither is expected to be retained)

property.name: content
property.description: The jinja template for the krb5.conf file
